name: showCorrectionIndicator(of:primaryString:alternativeStrings:forStringIn:view:completionHandler:)
desc: Display a suitable user interface to indicate a correction may need to be made.
declaration:
func showCorrectionIndicator(of type: NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType, 
               primaryString: String, 
          alternativeStrings: [String], 
                 forStringIn rectOfTypedString: NSRect, 
                        view: NSView, 
           completionHandler completionBlock: ((String?) -> Void)? = nil)
